page.title: 14Rubery Cubs and Scouts
page.content: The 12th. Rubery Cub Pack consists of four sixes: Red, White, Green, Yellow. We meet at the Cub Hut at St. Chads' Church every Thursday evening at 6.15 p.m. We play games, like crab football, tracking, cat & mouse, and a load more besides. We also go camping, and every year we go to Butlins Holiday Camp. ({J. Goode & I O'Brien} ) Scouts is on a Thursday night after Cubs. It starts at 7.15 p.m. and ends at 9.30 p.m. When you are changed you play games like Chinese Rice, where two people are 'on' and they have a sponge ball and it has to hit you below the knees to get you out. When you are {invested}you have to pay 35p. for subs. We some times go onto the field and pitch tents. Every year we go on camps to Barry Island and Butlins ({D.Hayes})
